title: Ivana Kovačević, Wife of EXIT Festival Founder, Dies at 45
description: A mother of three, Kovačević leaves behind a legacy of love and influence after helping build one of Europe's top EDM festivals.
author: Cameron Sunkel

title: RISE Festival 2025 to Feature "One of the Largest Music Festival Stages In the US"
description: For its 10th anniversary festival, RISE has unveiled "The Horizon," a colossal new stage aiming to redefine the American festival experience in the Mojave Desert.

title: James Lowe, Singer in Psych-Rock Band the Electric Prunes, Dies at 82
description: His smoky croon elevated songs like “I Had Too Much to Dream (Last Night)” and “Get Me to the World on Time”

title: Al Foster, Virtuoso Jazz Drummer to Miles Davis and Herbie Hancock, Dies at 82
description: Foster also played in the bands of Sonny Rollins, McCoy Tyner, Joe Henderson, and can be heard on Davis’ studio LPs On the Corner and Big Fun

title: Taylor Swift buys back master rights to first six albums from Shamrock Capital
description: Taylor Swift has successfully acquired the master recordings of her first six studio albums from investment firm Shamrock Capital. The deal brings to a close one of the music industry’s most high-profile ownership disputes. Swift confirmed the news on Friday (May 30) in a handwritten letter to her fans.
